name: Shape
description: Represents a generic shape object in the worksheet.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Represents the name of the shape.

properties.name: left
properties.description: The distance, in points, from the left side of the shape to the left of the worksheet.

properties.name: top
properties.description: The distance, in points, from the top edge of the shape to the top of the worksheet.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Represents the width, in points, of the shape.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Represents the height, in points, of the shape.

properties.name: rotation
properties.description: Represents the rotation, in degrees, of the shape.

properties.name: geometricShape
properties.description: Returns the geometric shape for the shape object. Error will be thrown, if the shape object is other shape type (Like, Image, SmartArt, etc.) rather than GeometricShape.

properties.name: image
properties.description: Returns the image for the shape object. Error will be thrown, if the shape object is other shape type (Like, GeometricShape, SmartArt, etc.) rather than Image.

properties.name: zOrderPosition
properties.description: Returns the position of the specified shape in the z-order, the very bottom shape's z-order value is 0.

properties.name: altTextTitle
properties.description: Returns or sets the alternative title text string for a Shape object when the object is saved to a Web page.

properties.name: altTextDescription
properties.description: Returns or sets the alternative descriptive text string for a Shape object when the object is saved to a Web page.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Returns the type of the specified shape.

properties.name: lockAspectRatio
properties.description: Represents if the aspect ratio locked, in boolean, of the shape.

properties.name: placement
properties.description: Represents the placment, value that represents the way the object is attached to the cells below it.

properties.name: geometricShapeType
properties.description: Represents the geometric shape type of the specified shape.

properties.name: textFrame
properties.description: Returns the textFrame object of a shape. Read only.

properties.name: fill
properties.description: Returns the fill formatting of the shape object.

methods.name: setZOrder
methods.description: Moves the specified shape in front of or behind other shapes in the collection (that is, changes the shape's position in the z-order).

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: where to move the specified shape relative to the other shapes.
